reviews.title: Stylish and Feature-Packed Smartwatch
reviews.product_variant: Colour: Leather Classic BlackStyle Name: Leather strap
reviews.body: The NoiseFit Halo is an excellent smartwatch with a stunning 1.43" AMOLED display and a premium metallic finish. Bluetooth calling works smoothly, and the gesture controls are a nice touch. With 100 sports modes and reliable health tracking, it's perfect for daily use. Stylish, functional, and great value for money!

reviews.title: This watch is amazing
reviews.product_variant: Colour: BlackStyle Name: Metal Strap

reviews.title: Product Review: NoiseFit Halo 2 Smartwatch ‚Äì 5 Stars!
reviews.product_variant: Colour: BlackStyle Name: Metal Strap
reviews.body:
I recently got the NoiseFit Halo 2, and I must say, it's absolutely fantastic! This watch has exceeded all my expectations in terms of both performance and style.

The AMOLED display is stunning‚Äîsuper vibrant, bright even under sunlight, and incredibly responsive. The build quality feels premium with its sleek metallic frame, and the strap is very comfortable for all-day wear.

In terms of features, it's packed! Bluetooth calling works seamlessly, the health tracking is accurate (heart rate, SpO2, sleep monitoring, everything), and the sports modes cover almost every activity I do. The battery life is impressive too, easily lasting 5-6 days on a single charge.

Also, the user interface is smooth and easy to navigate, and the NoiseFit app gives detailed insights that really help me keep track of my fitness.

Overall, this is an extremely good smartwatch‚Äîgreat value for money, stylish, feature-rich, and reliable. I‚Äôm giving it a solid 5-star rating and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a budget-friendly yet premium smartwatch!

reviews.body: I recently bought the Noise Halo Plus, and honestly, I‚Äôm really impressed. It looks stylish on the wrist, the screen is super clear, and it‚Äôs packed with useful features. I‚Äôve been using it daily to track my steps, heart rate, and sleep, and it‚Äôs been spot on. The battery lasts longer than I expected too. Overall, I‚Äôm really happy with the purchase‚Äî

reviews.title: Best at the price range
reviews.product_variant: Colour: Vintage BrownStyle Name: Leather strap
reviews.body:
Its been a month since am using the product and I would say am totally satisfied with what is offered at the price range. Being a fitbit band user before, from accuracy point its not up to the mark but still its quite reliable.

Pros and cons as per per my usage
Design: Design looks premium and with leather belt looks quite a premium.

Features: Am not a fan of too many features and rather quality and reliability of the feature which is being offered. Considering that it has almost all the basic features and they are quite reliable.

Battery life: Am quite amazed at the battery life. With moderate usage keeping phone call off keeping only notifications on, am getting around a week's battery back up which is impressive.

Cons:
Accuracy: Being a fitbit owned user, I feel accuracy of the reading is not that accurate but would consider just ok with most the user(for atletics where reading should be accurate, woyld not recomment)

Heart Rate: There is no continious HR monitor, it can be kept manual or automatic every five 5 mins which is fine but a continuous reading qould be more beneficial. Also app doesnt calculate resting heart rate which i was been habitual with.

Customization: It has less customization, as in you cannot customize the menu screen or widget ordering and even app design coupd have been better.

reviews.title: Excellent watch (or Smartwatch)
reviews.product_variant: Colour: Leather Classic BlackStyle Name: Leather strap
reviews.body:
PROS:

1. Health Tracking: Don‚Äôt buy ANY smartwatch go for medical equipments and consider doctor‚Äôs prescription
2. Fitness tracking, Quality: Good enough
3. Connectivity: Haselfree bluetooth connectivity
4. Calling: I tried only few times but works everytime

CONS:
1. Brightness: This can be improved for outdoors for medium level but at max brightness it is good enough
2. Strap: Can be improved but not a major complaint

reviews.title: Very nice happy with this
reviews.product_variant: Colour: Leather Classic BlackStyle Name: Leather strap
reviews.body: If I want to say in one sentence then in this price money very good, only battery backup is concerned below expectations.

cons: Accuracy of readings may not be up to the mark
Brightness could be improved for outdoor use
summary: The NoiseFit Halo is a stylish and functional smartwatch with a stunning display and premium finish.
It offers reliable health tracking and a wide range of sports modes for daily use.
Users have praised its Bluetooth connectivity and clear call sound.
Some drawbacks include accuracy issues, limited customization options, and strap quality.
Overall, the NoiseFit Halo is a great value for money option for those looking for a budget-friendly yet feature-rich smartwatch.
